alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 4:25AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Atlantic and central Cape May Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 425 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ocean City to near West Cape May. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlantic City, Ocean City, Cape May, Pleasantville, Somers Point, Ventnor City, Brigantine, Northfield, Absecon, Margate City, North Wildwood, Wildwood Crest, Sea Isle City, Avalon, West Cape May, Longport, Stone Harbor, Corbin City, Cape May Court House and Scotch Bonnet. This includes the following highways... Garden State Parkway between mile markers 0 and 31. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 0 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic
